required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of HPV Vaccine On The Prevalence Of HPV In Norway
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of HPV Vaccine On The Prevalence Of Human Papillomavirus In Mouth And Vagina In Norway

brief_summary.textblock: The overall aim of the study is to assess the effect of school-based Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination by comparing type-specific HPV prevalence between vaccinated and non-vaccinated women born in 1997. Women born in 1997, residence to Norway in 2009 (the year of vaccine initiation of the 1997-cohort) are invited to participate in the study.

detailed_description.textblock:
This cohort is amongst the first that was offered HPV vaccine in an organized vaccination programme globally. The women will be recruited through Facebook ads. The study will enable us to measure differences in the prevalence of HPV types in vagina and the mouth between vaccinated and non-vaccinated young women in Norway.
The womens vaccination status will be validated by linkage to the Norwegian Immunisation Registry (SYSVAK) and their residence status will be validated through linkage to the Norwegian Population Registry.

primary_outcome.measure: Vaginal and oral HPV-6, HPV-11, HPV-16 and HPV-18 prevalence
primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 2 months after self-collection of specimens
primary_outcome.description: The differences in HPV types prevalence among vaccinees and non-vaccinees. HPV types will be assessed individually and combined.

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of oral and vaginal overall genotype distribution among vaccinated and non-vaccination participants
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 2 months after self-collection of specimens

arm_group.description: Women born in 1997, resident to Norway in 2009, vaccinated by the quadrivalent HPV vaccine. Interventions: Self sample from vagina using Rover's Evalyn Brush Self sample from the oral cavity using COPAN's FloqSwab Questionnaire

Women born in 1997, resident to Norway in 2009, not vaccinated by the quadrivalent HPV vaccine Interventions: Self sample from vagina using Rover's Evalyn Brush Self sample from the oral cavity using COPAN's FloqSwab Questionnaire

intervention.description: Self sample using The Rover's Evalyn Brush

intervention.intervention_name: Self sample from the oral cavity

intervention.description: Questionnaire about vaccination status and sexual behaviour

biospec_descr.textblock: Self samples from vagina and the oral cavity

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Female
- Born in 1997
- Resident of Norway in 2009
Exclusion Criteria:
- Male
- Born before or after 1997
- Non-resident of Norway in 2009

facility.name: Oslo University Hospital, Cancer Registry of Norway
